scene: A large brick building with a clock tower and a green roof
objects: A bench on the sidewalk in front of the building
notable_features: A clock tower on top of the building
locations: A courtyard in front of the building
reasoning: The building's architectural style and clock tower suggest it was constructed in the 12th century. The large brick facade and green roof also contribute to the building's medieval appearance. The bench on the sidewalk in front of the building provides a place for visitors to sit and enjoy the view of the courtyard and the building itself.
description: A large, medieval-style brick building with a clock tower and a green roof, situated in a courtyard with a bench on the sidewalk in front of it.
